aws_secretsmanager_secret.description: Provides a resource to manage AWS Secrets Manager secret metadata

name.description: Specifies the friendly name of the new secret. The secret name can consist of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and any of the following characters: `/_+=.@-` Conflicts with `name_prefix`.

name_prefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

kms_key_id.description: Specifies the ARN or alias of the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK

policy.description: A valid JSON document representing a [resource policy](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/secretsmanager/latest/userguide/auth-and-access_resource-based-policies.html). For more information about building AWS IAM policy documents with Terraform, see the [AWS IAM Policy Document Guide](https://learn.hashicorp.com/terraform/aws/iam-policy).

recovery_window_in_days.description: Specifies the number of days that AWS Secrets Manager waits before it can delete the secret. This value can be `0` to force deletion without recovery or range from `7` to `30` days. The default value is `30`.

rotation_lambda_arn.description: Specifies the ARN of the Lambda function that can rotate the secret.

rotation_rules.description: A structure that defines the rotation configuration for this secret. Defined below.

tags.description: Specifies a key-value map of user-defined tags that are attached to the secret.
